Service Details: - Connects people in pain to resources that go beyond the doctor’s office- Ability to talk confidentially with trained volunteers on the phone or online to help manage the following issues: Income, Isolation, Housing, Employment, Food security, Childcare, Education, Recreation, and other challenges one might face
